thread.title: Star Kids Products Announces Snack & Play™ Travel Tray 2.0
thread.title_full: Star Kids Products Announces Snack & Play™ Travel Tray 2.0 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Star Kids Products Announces Snack & Play™ Travel Tray 2.0
text:
Star Kids Products
Make travel easy and more fun!
DENVER , Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Now with an electronic safe, dry erase surface, and dedicated cup holder, the Snack & Play™ Travel Tray 2.0 is available for purchase and comes with a free magnet. As with the original Snack & Play™ Travel Tray, version 2.0 also has two large attached storage pockets for snacks and toys.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277468
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277469
"We continually improve upon our product designs and this is the next phase of travel tray evolution. We also have several other projects in development," said Star Kids™ Products founder, Alyson Probst .
The Snack & Play™ Travel Tray 2.0 is a great way to entertain children and make travel more fun! Use in the car, on an airplane, train, take it camping, or to the beach... Use it anywhere you want!
Founded in 2002, Star Kids™ Products creates and manufactures products to make life easier and more fun when traveling. The company is 95% women owned and has received multiple industry awards and accolades.
Contact:
Jon Looker
PR and Marketing Director
Star Kids™ Products
(720) 327-1302
